The next half a verse is devoted to the superiority of teaching sentient beings.
The next four verses are on the superiority of the arising of worldly wisdom.
The next seven verses are on the ground-level result.
The first three are on gentleness.
The next three and a half verses are on taking in the rewards.
The next half is on the wisdom of the vow.

source_sentence: 後一結說究竟難勝地竟。
translation: The last concluding verse explains the completion of the stage of ultimate victory over difficulty.

source_sentence: 華嚴經探玄記卷第十二
translation: Huayan jing tanxuan ji roll twelfth
